mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM site_info si, site_link sl, site_link_data sld WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl AND sl.link_srl = sld.link_srl AND sl.use_yn = 'Y'
AND sld.data_title like CONCAT('%', #{item} ,'%')

SELECT sld.data_srl , si.site_nm , sl.link_cd , sld.data_title , sld.data_link , sld.data_img , sld.data_content , sld.reg_dt , sld.upt_dt FROM site_info si, site_link sl, site_link_data sld WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl AND sl.link_srl = sld.link_srl AND sl.use_yn = 'Y'
AND sld.data_title like CONCAT('%', #{item} ,'%')
ORDER BY data_srl DESC
LIMIT #{rowStart}, #{rowSize}

SELECT sl.link_srl , sl.site_srl , si.site_nm , sl.link_cd , sl.link_nm , sl.link_url , sl.link_cls , sl.link_mtd_lst , sl.link_mtd_cts , sl.link_cnt , sl.batch_itv , sl.use_yn , sl.reg_dt , sl.upt_dt , sl.exc_dt FROM site_info si, site_link_data sl WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl AND sl.link_srl = #{linkSrl}
